text: One owl said to another, "I am in great pain. It's heavy and round and it hurts me. And the other oyster said, proudly, "Glory be to the heavens and the sea!" I don't feel pain inside myself. I feel good and intact inside and out. At that moment, a crab passing by heard the two oysters, and said to the one who was fine inside and out: "Yes, you feel fine and intact; but the pain your neighbor endures is a pearl of incomparable beauty. FIN
title: La perla
author: Gibrán Jalil Gibrán
